name: lerna-typescript-jest-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate template of a monorepo setup using Lerna, TypeScript and Jest

scripts.bootstrap: npm install lerna && lerna bootstrap && npm install
scripts.reset: npm run cleanup && rimraf -rf node_modules && npm run bootstrap
scripts.build: npm run cleanup && lerna run compile
scripts.build:watch: npm run cleanup && lerna run compile:watch --stream
scripts.demo: npm run build && (cd packages/demo-app && npm run start)
